name: CorActio
storyline:
In this world, you take on the role of a spirit created by Mother Nature. This spirit has been sent to combat the ceaseless pollution caused by factories. Your journey begins as you enter a massive factory, using your unique ability to transform and adapt to the challenges ahead.

As the Protagonist, a nature spirit with transformation abilities, you must navigate through the factory's intricate levels, overcoming obstacles and solving puzzles. Your ultimate goal is to reach the heart of the factory and purify it from within.

CorActio offers a rich blend of platforming action and brain-teasing puzzles. Players will need to master the art of transformation to progress, adapting to each new challenge with creativity and skill.
summary: CorActio is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements set in an alternate, polluted version of our world. Developed by the indie studio Delusional Ram, this game immerses players in a mission to cleanse the environment from the relentless industrial pollution.
